epd_metadata.product_name: MortamixÂ® Rainbow Custom Color Mortar CementTM

product_description.usage: Formulated cementitious material for masonry mortars in brick, block, and stone masonry units. Recommended for load bearing walls and stucco applications.
product_description.composition: Combination of portland cement, plasticizers, ground limestone, air entraining additives, and inorganic color pigments.
product_description.types: Meets ASTM C1329 for Type S mortar cements.
product_description.colors: Available in many standard colors, including white. Custom colors can be formulated.
product_description.benefits: Meets ASTM C1329 for Type S mortar cement.

lca_information.physical_chemical_properties: Conforms to ASTM C1329 Type S and used to produce ASTM C270 Type S mortar.

transport_and_installation.preparatory_work: Mix in accordance with ASTM C270 proportions. Machine mixing recommended.
transport_and_installation.batching_sequence: Add 3/4 mix water, 1/2 sand, 1 bag mortar cement, then rest of sand and water. Mix 3-5 minutes.
precautions: Do not change sand sources or mixture proportions.
Erect a job specific sample panel.
transport_and_installation.safety_precautions: Consult Safety Data Sheet. Avoid skin contact. Use PPE.
transport_and_installation.storage_handling: Store above ground on pallets, covered with tarps or polyethylene. Allow air circulation.

additional_info.availability: Regionally available. Contact nearest sales office.
additional_info.cost: Pricing information available from nearest sales office.
additional_info.warranty: Material Certification Reports available upon request. No guarantee on finish work.
additional_info.technical_services: Contact nearest sales office or Technical Services Engineer.
